title: MRT Green Line & Arts
subTitle: 都會脈動：沿著捷運綠線的文藝復興
intro: Designed for travelers who love architecture and convenient transport. Travel via Taichung MRT and YouBike to explore the National Taichung Theater and Calligraphy Greenway.

spots.name: National Taichung Theater (臺中國家歌劇院)
spots.description: Designed by Toyo Ito. Admire the 'Sound Cave' concept and the stunning curved wall architecture that defies traditional construction.

spots.name: Shenji New Village (審計新村)
spots.description: Former government dormitories turned into a vibrant creative cluster. Perfect for finding handmade crafts and unique desserts.

spots.name: Calligraphy Greenway & PARK2 (草悟道)
spots.description: A green corridor connecting the Science Museum and Art Museum. Chill at PARK2 Caowu Square for an adult-style park experience.

title: Blue Highway & Wetlands
subTitle: 藍色公路：2026海線新地標與夕陽
intro: Explore the new 2026 Taichung Marine Ecology Hall and the world-famous Gaomei Wetlands. A route designed for bus travelers.

spots.name: Wuqi Fishing Port (梧棲漁港)
spots.description: Visit the fish market for fresh seafood brunch. Try the grilled squid and oyster omelet.

spots.name: Taichung Marine Ecology Hall (台中市海洋生態館)
spots.description: The newest hotspot in 2026. Explore the giant ocean tank and learn about the ecology of the Dajia River.

spots.name: Gaomei Wetlands (高美濕地)
spots.description: Walk on the wooden boardwalk to see fiddler crabs and witness one of the most beautiful sunsets in the world.

title: Time Traveler in Old City
subTitle: 時光旅人：舊城探索與文創再生
intro: Deep dive into the lifestyle and history of Central District. From the old train station to the colorful Rainbow Village.

spots.name: Miyahara (宮原眼科)
spots.description: A former eye clinic turned into a Harry Potter-esque dessert shop. Famous for its massive ice cream sundaes and pineapple cakes.

spots.name: Taichung Prefectural Hall (台中市役所)
spots.description: Enjoy afternoon tea in this beautiful Tatsuno-style building from the Japanese colonial era.

spots.name: Rainbow Village (彩虹眷村)
spots.description: A vibrant village painted by 'Grandpa Rainbow'. A colorful testament to military dependents' village culture.

title: Forest Breath & Urban Leisure
subTitle: 森呼吸：大坑步道與都會休閒
intro: Balance hiking in Taichung's back garden with urban exploration. Visit the unique wooden trails of Dakeng and the Science Museum.

spots.name: Dakeng Trail No. 9 (大坑9號步道)
spots.description: A friendly trail with a farmer's market at the entrance. Great for families and tasting local produce.

spots.name: Hanxi Night Market (旱溪夜市)
spots.description: A local favorite open on Tue/Thu/Fri/Sat. Experience the authentic atmosphere of a traditional Taiwanese night market.

spots.name: National Museum of Natural Science (科博館)
spots.description: Explore the Botanical Garden and Dinosaur Hall. Don't miss the pan-fried buns nearby for a quick snack.

title: Taichung Grand Tour
subTitle: 山海屯全覽：台中旅遊終極版圖
intro: The ultimate collection of Taichung's highlights: Wetlands, Theme Parks, and Urban landmarks. Cross from the coast to the city center.

spots.name: Lihpao Resort (麗寶樂園渡假區)
spots.description: Home to the gravitational tilt coaster and a huge outlet mall. Ride the Sky Dream Ferris Wheel for a night view.

spots.name: Maple Garden (秋紅谷)
spots.description: A unique sunken ecological park in the city center, acting as a green lung amidst skyscrapers.

spots.name: National Taichung Theater (國家歌劇院)
spots.description: End your trip admiring the architectural marvel and shopping for cultural creatives inside.

title: Cultural Origins & Modern Art
subTitle: 文化溯源：霧峰林家與現代藝術
intro: A deep dive into Taiwan's modern history and art. Visit the majestic Wufeng Lin Family Mansion and the Ando Tadao Art Museum.

spots.name: Wufeng Lin Family Mansion (霧峰林家宮保第園區)
spots.description: The only surviving Qing Dynasty first-rank official residence in Taiwan. The 'Grand Flower Hall' features an exquisite theatrical stage.

spots.name: Asia Museum of Modern Art (亞洲大學現代美術館)
spots.description: Designed by Tadao Ando using triangular geometry. A masterpiece of concrete architecture.

spots.name: Taichung Literature Museum (台中文學館)
spots.description: A renovated Japanese police dormitory complex centered around a magnificent old banyan tree.
